text: After ten years, I am leaving Facebook.I am starting a company.

At Facebook, when we were under existential threat from Google Plus, Zuck gathered everyone around the Palo Alto office and gave a passionate rallying cry - a call to be extremely hardcore (in twitter speak) which we called “Lockdown”. The kitchens were open on weekends..We won!
Elon could be like “static types are good” and then people would knee-jerk delete their typescript annotations.
Somebody hass gotta write the code that Ai is trained on.

Many people did not even need server powered react to make the choice clear. Rendering in same language that handles UI events is a big selling point by itself. But it is cool that people can also get the remaining advantages of PHP’s model in “client” rendered frameworks.
